segments.text: Hey everyone, and welcome to the podcast. This is a short, experimental show generated entirely by AI.
Today we're talking about building apps that create content automatically, from podcasts to audio stories.
The idea is simple. You write the structure, the AI brings the voice, and suddenly you have a podcast in seconds.
Solche Technologien zeigen, wie schnell sich Medien gerade ver√§ndern. Jeder kann heute zum Podcaster werden.
Thanks for listening. This was a short demo, but the possibilities are endless. See you in the next episode.
